reviewText: Great for kids and adults for brushing up on algebra. Teaches step by step easy ways to work out algebra problems.. The audio is pretty bad but is a great learning video. I'd definitely recommend this.

Wow, take math and make it boring, what a concept!  Why put a flashy cover on a video that is nothing more than a man standing in front of a white board giving instruction at the most basic level?  I am giving this 2 stars only because the concepts are accurate, and if someone were desperate, they could actually learn from this, but with so many other resources available, I am sorry I wasted my money.  As a math teacher, I was hoping for something to reinforce concepts, not put me to sleep or moaning in boredom.

I needed this to study for my math placement test.  I just found a book that went with my course from Amazon.  It is allot cheaper then the bookstore.  I got to let my program manager know.  Yes, he knows I save money.
